node.display_long_description:
一起游戏。或许永远一起。 

在这款在线合作的VR游戏中，找到一个好友一起合作帮助卡莉完成任务，在合作解谜的平台冒险中逃出底下世界。 

你的好友可以在PC或Mac上免费加入！

穿上刚刚死去的卡莉的写字，你就可以在不可思议的平台挑战时奔跑跳跃 -- 或者扮演死神的角色，实时改变你周围的环境让卡莉有的新的地方可以探索，避开危险的障碍，帮助她完成不可能的任务。

卡莉和死神是一种独特的VR合作体验，能同时平衡大脑和肌肉协调，你可以通过解谜找到逃出阴森的地下世界平台的道路。

nodes.title: Game Patch
nodes.body_text:
Thanks for your continued excitement for Carly and the Reaperman. The team has been working on additional fixes based on feedback from the community. Please make sure to update the game both on Quest and PC/Mac.

Release Notes:
Fixed elevators with better sync
Fixed an issue where Carly would sometimes glide off horizontal elevators
Fixed some issues with fade in when loading a level
Synced some previously unsynced game items
Updated visuals on some backgrounds
Reaperman’s mouth is now moving when the player talks
 
If you’re experiencing game issues, please reach out to us on Discord or email us at support@resolutiongames.com.

nodes.title: Game Patch
nodes.body_text:
First off, we just want to say that we're so happy to see the response to the release of the game – thank you so much for being with us on this journey!

Secondly, we released a patch addressing some issues that were reported and we hope that you will have an even better time playing now. Please make sure to update the game both on Quest and on PC/Mac!

Release Notes:
- Fixed a number of audio issues, if you're still experiencing issues, please reach out to us on Discord or email us at support@resolutiongames.com.
- Fixed bug causing blocks held in the right hand to be slightly offset in multiplayer.
- Fixed bug causing Carly to sometimes be pushed off blocks when Reaperman pushed them.
- Fixed bug causing Carly to sometimes be visible under the platform when entering the portal.
- Fixed bug where Carly would glide when in dialogs.
- Disabled 'Quit to Hub' from the pause menu, since this would sometimes mean having to replay already cleared levels.
- Disabled 180-degree turn using thumbstick down.
- Various graphical tweaks and improvements.
- Carly players on PC/Mac can now point at points of interest.

Please note that this version is not compatible with the previous, so please make sure to update the game on all devices.

node.reviewDescription:
The game itself is brilliant. Some of the levels had my hands sweating with concentration and fear of falling into the abyss. Plenty of invention in the game from evil floating fish to walls of lasers which will kill you, plus the occasional puzzle. One of my best moments in VR is when I figured out how to climb to the top of a level to reach a firefly which I had genuinely thought was impossible.

However, the thing that really frustrated is that I've found myself playing the same levels almost continuously. I got caught in one loop where I'd play the levels to the end and keep going back to the first one of the loop. After emailing the devs it was explained that you could get out of the loop by not completing one of the levels- though your natural inclination is to progress by finishing it - but by going through a door within the level.

Just as frustrating is that in Firefly Alley there are a number of doors. And if you go through one you've already gone through - which might have been days ago - you have no option but to play the whole level again. If you  wander in the wrong door there should be a way you can just back out without going through the level you've already completed. 

As much as I love the game I keep needlessly repeating levels and it's getting to seriously detract from what would otherwise be a five-star game.

UPDATE: Received email from devs saying that a future update which will allow you to leave levels you've already completed. And visual cues to tell which is the next door to go through. When then happens it will easily be one of the best games on the Quest.
node.reviewTitle: Love this game, but frustrating flaws
